_header: O Mother of God inviolate Virgin Mary
Subjects: Christ, burial and resurrection; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: ‘Off þe Resurreccioun of crist’ — five 8-line stanzas

BLAru285.First Lines: O Mother of God Inviolat Virgin maryExult in Ioy and consolatioun…
BLAru285.Last Lines: …Be infynite laude in tyme & vniteQuhois glaid vprissing blithis euery uyght
BLAru285.Attributed Title: Off þe Resurrectioun of crist (rubric, f. 174v)
